resetPassword.title: Setup new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Please enter your new password. Be sure to use a strong password, we didn't have enough budget for proper security
resetPassword.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number

subtitle.part1:
